00031 using namespace Hypertable::DfsBroker;

00036 void RequestHandlerMkdirs::run() {
00037   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00038   const char *dirName;
00039   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->messageLen - 2;
00040   uint8_t *msgPtr = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00041 
00042   // directory name
00043   if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msgPtr, &remaining, &dirName))
00044     goto abort;
00045 
00046   m_broker->mkdirs(&cb, dirName);
00047 
00048   return;
00049 
00050  abort:
00051   HT_ERROR("Encoding problem with MKDIRS message");
00052   cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Encoding problem with MKDIRS message");
00053   return;
00054 }
